item.name: Palandri Wines
item.address1: Cnr Boundary Road/Bussell Highway, Cowaramup, WA 6284
item.description: After a period of spectacular growth and marketing activity, Palandri went into voluntary administration in February 2008. In June of that year, 3 Oceans Wine Company Pty Ltd acquired the Margaret River winery, the 30-year-old Margaret River vineyard and 347ha of Frankland River vineyards. In October 08 it also acquired the Palandri and Baldivis Estate brands. Exports to the UK and other major markets.
